active_or_passive_rules.name: Warlord of Carn Dum
active_or_passive_rules.description: Friendly Carn Dum models within 6" re-roll failed Courage tests.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Battle Frenzy
active_or_passive_rules.description: If Aldrac slays an enemy model in combat, then he may declare a free Heroic Combat in the following turn.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Lead by Example
active_or_passive_rules.description: In a turn where Buhrdur slays an enemy Hero or Monster, all friendly Angmar Orc and Troll models within 6" count as being in range of a banner.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Glory Seekers
active_or_passive_rules.description: If this model is in combat with an enemy hero model (but not if they are supporting) then this model gets +1 To Wound when making strikes against that enemy hero.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Troll Chain
active_or_passive_rules.description: A throwing weapon with range 3" and Strength 5.

active_or_passive_rules.name: A Fell Light is in Them
active_or_passive_rules.description: During its move, a spectre can choose an enemy model within 12" and in Line of Sight. The model must pass a courage test or make a full move under the spectre's control, even if it has already moved, and then it cannot move any further that turn.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Impressive Girth
active_or_passive_rules.description: When Golfimbul suffers a wound, roll a D6. On a 5+, the Wound is ignored. This cannot be used for Wounds caused by Magical Powers.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Immortal Hunger
active_or_passive_rules.description: Regains a single Wound for each model slain. Rend is the only Brutal Power Attack that can also work in this manner. His wounds can never exceed 4.

active_or_passive_rules.name: *Strength of Body, Strength of Will
active_or_passive_rules.description: Attack and Courage value are equal to remaining wounds.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Pathfinders
active_or_passive_rules.description: At the start of a game, if you have any Hill Trolls in your force, you may select a piece of difficult terrain (other than a water feature). Friendly Angmar models will no longer treat it as difficult terrain. This still does not allow a model to fly out of a woods.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Hill Troll Intelligence
active_or_passive_rules.description: May re-roll a single D6 in the Duel roll when fighting solely against infantry models (but not Monsters). Burdhur also gains this rule for the rest of the game if he is in your force.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Scavenge
active_or_passive_rules.description: Whenever Nazthak kills an enemy model in combat (except for Monsters), he may scavenge a single piece of wargear carried by that model, except for a mount, the One Ring, or integral items to the model (such as claws and teeth). This happens before any effects that allow the enemy model to pass on that wargear. That item becomes part of Nazthak's wargear, with any of it's benefits. He may choose to discard any scavenged wargear at any time, but it cannot be reclaimed once done so.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Conduit of Angmar
active_or_passive_rules.description: Angmar Ringwraith models within 6" of a Shade may use this model to determine Line of Sight and range when casting magical powers. Also, that model may choose to deal a single a single wound to this Shade to gain +1 to the casting value.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Swirling Mists
active_or_passive_rules.description: At the start of a Shoot phase before Heroics are declared, a Shade may spend a point of Will to cause a -1 To Hit penalty for any shooting attack targeting a friendly model within 6" of the Shade. If the enemy model who is shooting is within 12" of the Shade, they suffer a -2 penalty instead.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Ghostly Resolve
active_or_passive_rules.description: Friendly Angmar Orc models within 12" of one or more friendly Shades add +1 to their Courage value.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Sap Fortitude
active_or_passive_rules.description: Spend a point of Will each time an enemy Hero within 6" spends a point of Might, Will or Fate. Roll a D6, and on a 4+, the enemy Hero must spend an extra point for that action or it will be cancelled.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Herald of Doom
active_or_passive_rules.description: At the start of the game, select one enemy hero model. While The Shadow of Rhudaur is within 6" of them, they suffer -1 to Fate rolls and -1 Courage.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Powers of Angmar
active_or_passive_rules.description: If The Shadow of Rhudaur rolls a natural 6 on a casting roll, the channelled version of that magical power will be used if it is not resisted.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Miasmatic Presence
active_or_passive_rules.description: At the start of the Move phase, spend 1 point of Will to negate the effects of Stand Fast! or Heroic Actions for all Warrior models within 6".

active_or_passive_rules.name: Seeping Decay
active_or_passive_rules.description: Roll a D6 for each non-spirit model (2D6 for cavalry), for both friendly or enemies in base contact. On a 6, they suffer a wound.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Glory Seekers
active_or_passive_rules.description: If this model is in combat with an enemy hero model (but not if they are supporting) then this model gets +1 To Wound when making strikes against that enemy hero.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Feral Charge
active_or_passive_rules.description: When a werewolf charges an enemy Infantry model, they gain the Knock to Ground special rule, as if they were a cavalry model. This bonus is lost if they are subsequently charged by an enemy Cavalry model.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Packlord
active_or_passive_rules.description: Only friendly Warg models benefit from a Wild Warg Chieftain's Stand Fast! And Heroic Actions.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Packlord
active_or_passive_rules.description: Only friendly Warg models benefit from a Wild Warg Chieftain's Stand Fast! And Heroic Actions.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Dubious Counsel
active_or_passive_rules.description: Alfrid may spend any number of Will points at the start of the Priority phase. For each point, choose a friendly Lake-town Hero model within 6" and roll a D6. For each roll of a 2+, that model gains a point of Might. However, on a roll of 1, that model loses a point of Might and Afraid gains a point Might. Might gained in this way can take the chosen model's store of Might beyond its initial level.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Master's Puppet
active_or_passive_rules.description: As long as the Master has Will points remaining, if Braga declares a Heroic Action within 6" of the Master, roll a D6. On a 4+, the action is free.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Air of Self-importance
active_or_passive_rules.description: Braga, any Lake-town Guard Captains or Lake-town Guards within 3" of him may not take part in Heroic Actions called by Bard, Bain, Sigrid or Tilda.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Moneybags
active_or_passive_rules.description: The Master can spend a point of Might at the start of the Fight phase. Braga, Lake-town Guards and Lake-town Guard Captains within 6" receive +1 Fight value, and count as being in range of a banner until the end of the phase.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Dragon-sickness
active_or_passive_rules.description: At the start of the game, your opponent may choose one of their Hero models to have a large sum of gold. If the Master is ever in base contact with that model, he must pass a Courage test or be removed from the game.

active_or_passive_rules.name: "Who would have the nerve to question me?"
active_or_passive_rules.description: If your army contains the Master of Lake-town, then he must be your leader, regardless of other models in your army. Additionally if you are including an Army of Lake-town allied contingent as part of a Convenient Alliance or Impossible Alliance, then the Master counts as a Hero of Fortitude.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Pick-hammer
active_or_passive_rules.description: Hand-and-a-half weapon, which may use either the Bash or Piercing Strike Special Strikes.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Pick-hammer
active_or_passive_rules.description: Hand-and-a-half weapon, which may use either the Bash or Piercing Strike Special Strikes.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Durin's Heir
active_or_passive_rules.description: Thrain's Stand Fast! affects all friendly Dwarf models on the battlefield, including Dwarf Hero models.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Ring of Durin
active_or_passive_rules.description: Once per game, you may re-roll a single Priority roll.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Blood Feud
active_or_passive_rules.description: Thrain re-rolls all failed To Wound rolls against Azog, and any model in the same army as Azog.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Arkenstone
active_or_passive_rules.description: Thror passes Fate rolls on a 3+. Also, if the result of a Fate roll is 4+, that roll is free, and does not cost a point of Fate.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Ring of Durin
active_or_passive_rules.description: Once per game, you may re-roll a single Priority roll.

additional_text: Guardians of the King (upgrade for Grim Hammers) in Thror's warband have Strength 4.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Sword-mace
active_or_passive_rules.description: This weapon may use Feint or Bash Special Strikes.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Young Sage
active_or_passive_rules.description: In the Priority phase, Balin may spend a Will point to enable his side to re-roll their D6 in the Priority roll.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Weapon Master
active_or_passive_rules.description: Dwalin is never considered unarmed, and never suffers the -1 penalty in Duel rolls for using a two-handed weapon.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Dwarven Fury
active_or_passive_rules.description: Before the Duel roll, Dwalin may choose to reduce his Fight value by D3. If he does so, Dwalin may re-roll all failed To Wounds rolls in the following fight.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Oakenshield
active_or_passive_rules.description: If Thorin uses Shielding in a Fight and wins, he may make a single Strike at his Strength (but no bonuses from any weapons).

active_or_passive_rules.name: To Arms!
active_or_passive_rules.description: Once per game when moving Thorin, this rule may be declared. All friendly Erebor Dwarf models within 3" of Thorin gain +1 Strength in the Fight phase for that turn.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Chieftain of the Dunedain
active_or_passive_rules.description: If your force includes Aranarth, you may include Ranger of the North and Dunedain as if they were from the Arnor army list, and they will gain the Arnor keyword. Additionally, friendly Rangers of the North and Dunedain within 6" of Aranarth count as being in range of a banner.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The King in the North
active_or_passive_rules.description: Arvedui's Stand Fast! Is 12", rather than 6".

active_or_passive_rules.name: Gift of Foresight
active_or_passive_rules.description: Every time a friendly Arnor model suffers a Wound within 6" of Malbeth, roll a D6. On a 5+, the Wound is prevented. If failed, Hero models may still use Fate points as normal.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Hunt Master
active_or_passive_rules.description: When mounted, Fimbul ignores the penalties suffered by Cavalry models trying to move in difficult terrain - this also enables him to gain the bonuses for charging.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Many Blades
active_or_passive_rules.description: Whilst they have the Infantry keyword, a model with this special rule gains +1 Attack.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Many Blades
active_or_passive_rules.description: Whilst they have the Infantry keyword, a model with this special rule gains +1 Attack.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Lethal Aim
active_or_passive_rules.description: Each turn, Narzug gets a free point of Might (even with no Might remaining) to modify either a To Hit, In The Way, or To Wound roll when shooting with his Orc bow.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Morgul Arrows
active_or_passive_rules.description: Any model that suffers a Wound from this model's shooting attack, and isn't slain, must roll a D6 at the start of each subsequent turn. On a roll of a 1, that model suffers a Wound.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Price of Failure
active_or_passive_rules.description: If your army contains both Azog and Yazneg, and the two are in base contact at the beginning of your Move phase, instead of rolling dice for Courage tests when your force is Broken, you may remove Yazneg from play. If you do so, Azog automatically passes his Courage test, and his Stand Fast! Will affect the entire battlefield. Additionally if you do so, whilst Azog is still alive, all Hunter Orcs, Hunter Orc Captains, Fimbul the Hunter and Narzug re-roll failed Courage tests.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Stone flail
active_or_passive_rules.description: Two-handed flail, but when used in a fight, Azog's Fight value is reduced to 6/5+. This does not happen when using the Whirl Special Strike. Causes D3 Wounds instead of one (determined after Fate points are used). Any model struck but not slain is knocked Prone.

active_or_passive_rules.name: General of the North
active_or_passive_rules.description: Stand Fast! has a range of 12", and affects Orc Hero models.

active_or_passive_rules.name: I am the Master
active_or_passive_rules.description: Never requires more than 3+ for To Wound against Hero models.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Bringer of Death
active_or_passive_rules.description: After Bolg has killed two enemy models, he causes Terror. After five or more kills, he gains the Harbinger of Evil special rule. After ten or more kill, he gains the Mighty Hero special rule.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Morgul Arrows
active_or_passive_rules.description: Any model that suffers a Wound from this model's shooting attack, and isn't slain, must roll a D6 at the start of each subsequent turn. On a roll of a 1, that model suffers a Wound.

additional_text: If you army includes Bolg, all Hunter orcs and Hunter Orc Captains in your army gain the Morgul Arrows special rule.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Goblin Crew
active_or_passive_rules.description: If the troll wins the fight, his Goblin crew may also make D6 Strength 3 strikes against those in combat with the troll. However, this cannot happen if the troll uses a Brutal Power Attack.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Metal Gauntlets
active_or_passive_rules.description: Never count as being unarmed, and he counts as Strength 10 when rolling for distance with a Hurl Brutal Power Attack

active_or_passive_rules.name: Catapult
active_or_passive_rules.description: A large Siege Engine that follows the rules for Volley Fire, with range 12” - 96”. Catapult shots are Strength 10. May still fire in same turn it has moved, but only hits on a 6. May still fire while in combat, but on a To Hit of 1, the troll suffers a wound. The troll does not have a normal crew like other Siege Engines. The troll is the Siege Veteran but has no points of Might, Will or Fate. The catapult cannot be destroyed as normal if an enemy spends its entire turn in base contact.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Area Effect
active_or_passive_rules.description: If the catapult hits a Battlefield target, all man-sized (or smaller) models within 2” are Knocked to Ground. Cavalry models within 2” must take a Thrown Rider test. Additionally, all models within 2” suffer a Strength 6 hit.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Chittering Hordes
active_or_passive_rules.description: This model can support other models who also have the Chittering Hordes rule, as if they had a spear. Supporting models do not get the benefit of two-handed weapons if it has one.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Mercenary Ambush
active_or_passive_rules.description: Warbands that contain solely Goblin Mercenaries do not have to deploy at the start of the game. From turn 2 onwards, the Captain may take a Courage in controlling player's Move phase. If passed, the player decides whether the warband arrives. If failed, the opposing player decides. If they arrive, they should be fully played within a terrain piece. If not possible, they may arrive from a board edge of the controlling player's choice instead.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Chittering Hordes
active_or_passive_rules.description: This model can support other models who also have the Chittering Hordes rule, as if they had a spear. Supporting models do not get the benefit of two-handed weapons if it has one.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Mercenary Ambush
active_or_passive_rules.description: Warbands that contain solely Goblin Mercenaries do not have to deploy at the start of the game. From turn 2 onwards, the Captain may take a Courage in controlling player's Move phase. If passed, the player decides whether the warband arrives. If failed, the opposing player decides. If they arrive, they should be fully played within a terrain piece. If not possible, they may arrive from a board edge of the controlling player's choice instead.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Oblivious to Pain
active_or_passive_rules.description: Each time a Berserker suffers a Wound, roll a D6. On a 6 (or a 5+ if the Banner of Angmar is manned on Azog's Signal Tower) the Wound is ignored. This is not cumulative with other special rules.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Crushing Club
active_or_passive_rules.description: Wounds caused by this weapon cause D3 Wounds instead. Determine the number of Wounds before Fate points are used. Any model that survives the strikes is also knocked Prone on a roll of a 3+.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Scythe Gauntlets
active_or_passive_rules.description: If armed with these gauntlets, the troll receives a +1 bonus on To Wound rolls when making strikes.

wargear: crushing club or pair of scythe gauntlets

active_or_passive_rules.name: Relentless Advance
active_or_passive_rules.description: When charging into combat, ogres can pass through friendly Orc, Goblin and Bat models, but each model they pass suffers a Strength 3 hit. A model that they end their move on is automatically removed as a casualty. The ogre cannot be Compelled/Commanded over friendly models if it is forced to Charge as part of that Magical Power.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Crew
active_or_passive_rules.description: The tower comes with three banners, a giant horn, and seven of Azog’s Lieutenants, who do not count towards Azog’s warband.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Deployment
active_or_passive_rules.description: Before deployment, but after players decide their board edges, the controlling player may place the Tower (with the Lieutenants on it) anywhere on the battlefield.

active_or_passive_rules.name: It must always be Manned
active_or_passive_rules.description: For each of the four parts of this tower, a Lieutenant must be in base contact with it for its effects to be enabled.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Banner of Dol Guldur
active_or_passive_rules.description: All friendly Gundabad models count as being in range of a banner.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Banner of Gundabad
active_or_passive_rules.description: All friendly Gundabad Hero models gains free Heroic Marches.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Banner of Angmar
active_or_passive_rules.description: All friendly Gundabad models may roll a D6 when wounded. On a natural 6, the wound is ignored.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Horn of Gorgorth
active_or_passive_rules.description: A War Horn that also reduces the Courage of all enemy models by -1. This is not cumulative with other rules.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Summoning of the Hosts
active_or_passive_rules.description: All friendly Gundabad models count as being in range of a banner.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Destroying the Signal Tower
active_or_passive_rules.description: Each part of the tower is a battlefield target with Defence 10 and 3 Wounds.    If an enemy spends a full turn in base contact with a part, without doing     anything else, that part is disabled and its effects are lost.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Deadly Union
active_or_passive_rules.description: If Azog is mounted upon the White Warg, both models can share each other's Might, Will and Fate points.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Pack Master
active_or_passive_rules.description: Once separated from Azog, only Warg models may use the White Warg's Stand Fast! And benefit from its Heroic Actions.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Raging Beast
active_or_passive_rules.description: When Azog dismounts, the White Warg automatically passes its Courage test to stay and fight, and will pass all Courage tests for the rest of the battle.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Crushing Blow
active_or_passive_rules.description: Each time a Troll Brute moves into base contact with another model, it must inflict a Strength 10 hit on that model. Cavalry models suffer this on both the mount and rider. If the model is slain, the Troll Brute may continue its move. If not slain, the Troll Brute must stop, and if the model is an enemy, it will fight that model in the Fight phase as normal.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Piercing Talons
active_or_passive_rules.description: When a War Bat charges, the Defence of the charged model and any models that subsequently counter-charge, is reduced by 2 against the War Bat's strikes.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Pluck
active_or_passive_rules.description: At the end of the War Bat's move, pick an unengaged man-sized (or smaller) enemy that it moved over, and roll a D6. On a 4+, they suffer a Strength 4 hit. If it survives, roll another D6. On a 4+, that model is Knocked to the Ground.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Accurate
active_or_passive_rules.description: A Mordor Siege Bow will only scatter 3" rather than 6".

active_or_passive_rules.name: Piercing Shot
active_or_passive_rules.description: If a shot hits a target, then they suffer one S9 hit. Additionally, if the target is S5 or lower, they are knocked Prone and flung D6” directly away from the Siege Bow. Any model the target   passes over is also knocked Prone and suffers one S6 hit. If the target hits impassable terrain, or a model that is S6 or higher, the target is knocked Prone and both the target and obstacle suffer one S6 hit.

additional_text: Crewed by three Orc Warriors, with armour and sword.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Indirect Fire
active_or_passive_rules.description: Always fires using Volley Fire, with range 12" - 96".

active_or_passive_rules.name: Area Effect
active_or_passive_rules.description: If a Battlefield target is hit, all models within 2" also suffer one Strength 5 hit and are knocked prone.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Wall-breaker
active_or_passive_rules.description: When rolling To Wound against a Siege target, you may roll two dice and pick the highest.

additional_text: Crewed by a Mordor Troll and three Orc Warriors, with armour and sword.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Whip of the Masters
active_or_passive_rules.description: Each time a friendly Mordor Hero model within 6" (including the Taskmaster himself) attempts a Heroic Move, March or Shoot, roll a D6. On a 4+, that action is free.

active_or_passive_rules.name: One of Nine
active_or_passive_rules.description: There can only be a maximum of nine Ringwraith models in your force (including any named Ringwraiths).

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Dark Lord
active_or_passive_rules.description: Must be your army's leader.

active_or_passive_rules.name: *The Lord of the Rings*
active_or_passive_rules.description: Free point of Will each turn.

active_or_passive_rules.name: **The One Ring
active_or_passive_rules.description: D6 for each wound that would slay him. On 2+, restore 1 Wound.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Unstoppable!
active_or_passive_rules.description: Can make one Strength 8 hit on all in the fight, including supports.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Flames of Evil
active_or_passive_rules.description: Single strike against one model. If they survive, they are Set Ablaze.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Lone Hunter
active_or_passive_rules.description: Shelob may never be taken as part of another model's warband.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Caught in a Web
active_or_passive_rules.description: Shelob can opt to direct a single strike at one model in the fight, that isn't a Monster. That model suffers one Strength 7 hit, and if wounded (and not prevented by Fate), the model is treated as being under the effect of the Paralyse magical power.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Morgul Blade
active_or_passive_rules.description: (Once per game) Direct all attacks against one model, if they suffer at least one wound, they are instantly killed. Heroes may use Fate, but if a single Wound is not saved, they are still slain.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Crown of Morgul
active_or_passive_rules.description: Attack value increased to 3. You can re-roll one dice when rolling for Casting or Resist tests.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Pavise
active_or_passive_rules.description: Giant wooden shield that provides +3 Defence, so long as the model is not engaged in a Fight. May use the same rules for shielding, but does not gain the +1 Defence bonus due to also carrying a crossbow.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Commanding Bellow
active_or_passive_rules.description: Friendly Corsair models within 3" of the Bo'sun count as being in range of a banner.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Mindless Killers
active_or_passive_rules.description: If a Reaver starts it's move at least 6" away from a Corsair Bo'sun, it must take a Courage test. If failed, it must charge the nearest enemy. If no enemies are in range, it must charge the nearest friendly model. If no friendlies are in range, it must move 6" towards the nearest enemy. Whilst in this rampage, the reaver also gains +1 in To Wound rolls and does not take Courage tests for charging Terror-causing models.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Smoke Bombs
active_or_passive_rules.description: Throwing weapon with Strength 1. Any target hit but not slain but spend a point of Will or be subject to the Channelled version of Transfix. If Dalamyr rolls a 1 on To Hit, he has run out of supply cannot use smoke bombs again for the rest of the game.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Preternatural Agility
active_or_passive_rules.description: Dalamyr can never be Trapped whilst still standing.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Ruthless Commander
active_or_passive_rules.description: Friendly Corsair Warrior models within 3" may re-roll a single dice during the Duel roll. However if they use this bonus and still fail to win the Duel roll, they immediately suffer a Strength 2 hit.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Spider Webs
active_or_passive_rules.description: A Mirkwood Spider can shoot webs, with a range of 8". If the spider hits its target, do not roll To Wound. Instead, the model suffers the effects of the Paralyse Magical Power. If a Hero model is hit by the web, it can attempt to spend a point of Fate to negate the effects of Paralyse.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Progeny
active_or_passive_rules.description: During any point of her Move phase, the Spider Queen may spend any number of Will points to summon a Broodling. For each Will point spent, place a Broodling anywhere within 3" of her, but not in base contact with any enemy models. Broodlings may Move and Charge on a turn in which they were summoned. Broodlings are not counted when working out if a force is Broken.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Morgul Blade
active_or_passive_rules.description: (Once per game) Direct all attacks against one model, if they suffer at least one wound, they are instantly killed. Heroes may use Fate, but if a single Wound is not saved, they are still slain.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Automatons
active_or_passive_rules.description: Castellans do not grant Stand Fast! to nearby Warrior models.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Will of the Necromancer
active_or_passive_rules.description: Castellans may use Will points as Fate points if they wish.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Rhunish Fury
active_or_passive_rules.description: Khamul the Easterling has 3 Attacks instead of 2.

active_or_passive_rules.name: One of Nine
active_or_passive_rules.description: Maximum of nine Ringwraith models in your army. Hero models wearing the Ring are not invisible to these models.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Servants of Evil
active_or_passive_rules.description: There are seven Nazgul of Dol Guldur profiles available.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Unholy Resurrection
active_or_passive_rules.description: When slain, place a marker where it was removed. In the next Priority phase after Priority has been rolled, roll a D6. On a 3+, the model regains 1 Wound, and may be placed within 6" of the marker, but not in base contact with an enemy. On a 1 or 2, the Nazgul is banished and the marker is removed. Wounds caused by Magical Powers or Elven-made weapons inflict a -1 penalty to this roll. Whilst the marker is in play, the Nazgul counts as being on the board when determining if your force is Broken or reduced to 25%. Markers cannot hold objectives, and still count as slain for special rules such as Heroic Combats. If the marker is still in play when the game ends, that Nazgul will count as having been slain.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Spiritual Displacement
active_or_passive_rules.description: You may have up to two Abyssal Knights. After Priority is rolled, you may move one Knight into base contact with your other Knight, but not in base contact with an enemy. This does not count as moving.

active_or_passive_rules.name: One of Nine
active_or_passive_rules.description: Maximum of nine Ringwraith models in your army. Hero models wearing the Ring are not invisible to these models.

active_or_passive_rules.name: You have something my Master wants!
active_or_passive_rules.description: The Keeper of the Dungeons gets +1 bonus To Wound against any model who bears one of the three Elven rings: Nenya, Narya or Vilya.

active_or_passive_rules.description: Any Nazgul of Dol Guldur in your army gain +1 bonus to rolls for their Unholy Resurrection rule, whilst the Necromancer is alive.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Breathe Fire
active_or_passive_rules.description: Spend a Will point to Breath Fire, which is like a bow with range 18". If the shot hits, the target and all models within 2" are Set Ablaze, and suffer a Strength 10 hit. Cavalry models suffer this on both the rider and mount. Fate may prevent these wounds, but any model that suffers just a single wound is slain.

active_or_passive_rules.name: *Desolator of the North
active_or_passive_rules.description: Smaug may spell a free Will point each turn. Also re-rolls To Wound rolls of 1 when making Strikes against Dwarf models.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Immovable Object
active_or_passive_rules.description: Cannot be Knocked to the Ground, Back Away, Trapped or move against his will. His opponent always Backs Away in a Fight.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Missing Scale
active_or_passive_rules.description: If a model rolls a natural 6 on a To Hit roll against Smaug, and the subsequent To Wound roll is successful, he will suffer a number of Wounds equal to the strength of the missile weapon.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Missing Scale
active_or_passive_rules.description: If he Charges and wins the Fight, all opponents are Knocked to Ground (except War Mumaks of Harad, Iron Hills Chariot, or any model that cannot be knocked Prone). If Smaug uses the Barge Brutal Power Attack, all models that Back Away suffer a Strength 9 hit.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Embedded Axe-blade
active_or_passive_rules.description: If Bifur wins a fight, he may make a single Strike against his opponent. If he wounds them, the axe-blade is his skull is removed, and he may now call a free Heroic Move each turn.

special_rules: Sworn Protector (Thorin Oakenshield, King Under the Mountain)

active_or_passive_rules.name: Steadfast
active_or_passive_rules.description: When targeted by a Magical Power or special rule, Bofur may roll a D6. On a 2+, its effects are ignored. Can be modified with Might. Bofur may only try to Resist a Magical Power before making his Steadfast roll.

special_rules: Sworn Protector (Thorin Oakenshield, King Under the Mountain)

active_or_passive_rules.name: Venerable

active_or_passive_rules.name: Prognostication

additional_stats.name: Howdah

active_or_passive_rules.description: This model can support other models who also have the Chittering Hordes rule, as if they had a spear. Supporting models do not get the benefit of two-handed weapons if it has one.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Chittering Hordes
active_or_passive_rules.description: This model can support other models who also have the Chittering Hordes rule, as if they had a spear. Supporting models do not get the benefit of two-handed weapons if it has one.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Precious
active_or_passive_rules.description: Unless there is another Ringbearer in play, Gollum has the Ring. If the Ringbearer is slain in a Fight with Gollum, he automatically adds the Ring to his wargear.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Strangler
active_or_passive_rules.description: Gollum is never considered to be unarmed.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Scourge
active_or_passive_rules.description: Throwing weapon with range 12" and Strength 2.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Swap with Me
active_or_passive_rules.description: A Special Heroic Action for the start of any phase. Grinnah can swap places with any Goblin model (except the Goblin Scribe) within 3" of him. Does not count as moving. There must be room to place the swapped model, otherwise the action is wasted.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Chittering Hordes
active_or_passive_rules.description: This model can support other models who also have the Chittering Hordes rule, as if they had a spear. Supporting models do not get the benefit of two-handed weapons if it has one.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Relentless Advance
active_or_passive_rules.description: When he charges, he can pass through Goblin models as he moves. Each Goblin he passes suffers a Strength 3 hit. Any Goblin that he ends his move on is slain. He cannot be Compelled/Commanded over friendly models if forced into combat.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Goblin Projectile
active_or_passive_rules.description: In the Shoot phase, if a friendly Goblin model is in base contact with him, and neither are in combat, he may make a shooting attack with range 12" and Strength 8, and automatically knocks prone any model it hits. Remove the Goblin from play.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Blubbery Mass
active_or_passive_rules.description: Every time he is wounded, roll a D6. On a 3+, the Wound is ignored, unless it was caused by a Magic Power or Elven-made weapon.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Always more where they came from
active_or_passive_rules.description: At the end of his Move phase, he may take a Courage test. If passed, you may move D3 extra Goblin Warriors onto the board (+1 for each point he passed his test by) - from a edge of your choosing. If he is forced to pass this Courage test, then D3 Goblin Warriors will enter the board as described above.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Immobile
active_or_passive_rules.description: The Goblin Scribe is automatically Trapped is he loses a Fight. In the Move phase, friendly models may move him, as if he were considered to be a Heavy Object.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Dead Shot
active_or_passive_rules.description: Can fire three shots in the shoot phase. Alternatively can make one shot that will always hit on 2+, regardless of In The Way tests (or if model is engaged in combat) and for Calvary models, he may choose whether he hits the rider or mount.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Orcrist
active_or_passive_rules.description: Elven-made hand-and-a-half sword with Orc bane, Goblin bane and Uruk-hai bane, Terror (Goblin), Terror (Orc) and Terror (Uruk-hai) special rules.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Glaive
active_or_passive_rules.description: A glaive can be used as either a spear or hand-and-a-half sword. Alternatively the bearer of the glaive can use the Shielding rule.

active_or_passive_rules.name: King's Knights
active_or_passive_rules.description: Whilst mounted, Mirkwood Cavalry count as being in range of a banner if they are within 6" of Thranduil.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Glaive
active_or_passive_rules.description: A glaive can be used as either a spear or hand-and-a-half sword. Alternatively the bearer of the glaive can use the Shielding rule.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Knife Fighters
active_or_passive_rules.description: Mirkwood rangers receive an additional Attack for each enemy model they engaged with after the first (max. of 3 bonus Attacks).

active_or_passive_rules.name: Knife Fighters
active_or_passive_rules.description: Mirkwood rangers receive an additional Attack for each enemy model they engaged with after the first (max. of 3 bonus Attacks).

active_or_passive_rules.name: King's Guard
active_or_passive_rules.description: Whilst within 3" of Thranduil, this model receives +1 Fight value.

active_or_passive_rules.name: King's Guard
active_or_passive_rules.description: Whilst within 3" of Thranduil, this model receives +1 Fight value.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Blade Mistress
active_or_passive_rules.description: Tauriel gains an additional Attack for each enemy she is engaged with after the first.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Vengeful Fury
active_or_passive_rules.description: If Kili the Dwarf, Champion of Erebor is in your army and killed, Tauriel gains Strength 5 and is reduced to Defence 4 for the remainder of the game.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Circlet of Kings
active_or_passive_rules.description: Cast Aura of Dismay and Nature's Wrath for free once per game.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Additional Elven-made sword
active_or_passive_rules.description: Thranduil gets Attack 3, Fight 7, and gains *Bladelord.

active_or_passive_rules.name: *Bladelord
active_or_passive_rules.description: If he has Infantry keyword, gain +1 Attack. Receive additional attack for each enemy model engaged with him after the first.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Keen Sight
active_or_passive_rules.description: Enemy models within 12" of Crebain do not gain the benefit of the Stalk Unseen special rule.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Cloud of Birds
active_or_passive_rules.description: Shooting attacks will only ever hit a Crebain on a natural 6 roll.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Slay their Horses!
active_or_passive_rules.description: Whilst they have the Cavalry keyword, Horsemen re-roll To Wounds of 1 against mounts.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Dunlending War Axe
active_or_passive_rules.description: Can either be used as a spear or two-handed axe.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Favour of the War Chief
active_or_passive_rules.description: Huscarls supporting a fight within 3" of a Dunlending Hero gain +1 Fight value in that fight.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Oblivious to Pain
active_or_passive_rules.description: When a Feral Uruk-Hai suffers a wound, roll a D6. On a 6, the wound is ignored.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Readied Stance
active_or_passive_rules.description: Calvary models do not gain the Extra Attack or Knock to Ground bonuses when Frida is in the fight, or supporting the fight.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Go for the Horse!
active_or_passive_rules.description: Frida and friendly Dunlending models within 3" may re-roll To Wound rolls against mounts during the Fight phase.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Lord of Dunland
active_or_passive_rules.description: If at the start of a fight, Gorulf is engaged with an enemy Hero, he may declare a Heroic Defence for free.

active_or_passive_rules.name: A Traitor Within
active_or_passive_rules.description: Grima can be deployed as part of an enemy warband, but moves and fights during the controlling player's turn. Enemy models cannot shoot him, strike blows, or shoot if he is In The Way of the shot. He can be targeted by Magical Powers. This ends if Saruman is slain, Grima voluntarily charges an enemy, or successfully wounds an enemy with his dagger. Grima may choose not to make any strikes if he wins a Duel.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Wormtongue
active_or_passive_rules.description: Heroic actions cast by enemy heroes within 6" cost 2 Might points.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Acurate
active_or_passive_rules.description: An Assault Ballista will only scatter 3" rather than 6"

active_or_passive_rules.name: Piercing Shot
active_or_passive_rules.description: If a shot hits a target, then they suffer one S9 hit. Additionally, if the target is S5 or lower, they are knocked Prone and flung D6" directly away from the Ballista. Any model the target passes over is also knocked Prone and suffers one S6 hit. If the target hits  impassable terrain, or a model that is S6 or higher, the target is knocked Prone and both the target and obstacle suffer one S6 hit.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Raise the Ladders!
active_or_passive_rules.description: See page 179 of Armies of LOTR book.

additional_text: Crewed by three Uruk-Hai Warriors, with heavy armour and sword.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Find the Halflings
active_or_passive_rules.description: Lurtz can choose when and where his warband will arrive in a scenario, no dice roll is required.

additional_text: Marauders (upgrade for Uruk-Hai Scouts) have a Move of 8".

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Palantir
active_or_passive_rules.description: Once per game, you may automatically win the Priority roll. Must be declared before any dice are rolled in the Priority roll.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Voice of Curunir
active_or_passive_rules.description: Saruman's Stand Fast! Range is 12", and affects hero models.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Lord of the Istari
active_or_passive_rules.description: Can re-roll one dice when making Casting or Resist tests.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Riding Dagger
active_or_passive_rules.description: Whenever an enemy Hero model in base contact resolves a strike against Sharku and fails To Wound, immediately resolve one Strength 4 Strike against that model.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Servant of Mordor
active_or_passive_rules.description: Snaga's warband may only include Orc models.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Cunning Mind
active_or_passive_rules.description: Snaga can choose not to take part in a friendly Hero model's Heroic Action, and act as normal. He can also choose to participate in the Heroic Action but does not have to remain within a specific range of that Hero.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Lord of Dunland
active_or_passive_rules.description: The range of Thrydan's Stand Fast! is 12".

active_or_passive_rules.name: Head Taker
active_or_passive_rules.description: If his warband is broken, instead of taking a courage test, Uglúk can kill a friendly Warrior within 2" and pass the test, with a Stand Fast! Range of 12" that affects both Warrior and Hero models

active_or_passive_rules.name: Berserker Blade
active_or_passive_rules.description: A hand-and-a-half sword. If using as a two-handed weapon, the berserker can do one Strength 4 at +1 To Wound on every model in base contact, friend or foe.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Oblivious to Pain
active_or_passive_rules.description: When the berserker suffers a wound, roll a D6. On a 6, the wound is ignored.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Impervious to Bow-fire
active_or_passive_rules.description: The berserkers Defence is 6 against enemy shooting attacks

active_or_passive_rules.name: Demolition Charges
active_or_passive_rules.description: See page 178 of Armies of LOTR book.

additional_text: Crewed by two Uruk-Hai Warriors with swords, one Uruk-Hai Berserker with a flaming brand and Berserker Blade, and one demolition charge.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Berserker Blade
active_or_passive_rules.description: A hand-and-a-half sword. If using as a two-handed weapon, the berserker can do one Strength 4 at +1 To Wound on every model in base contact, friend or foe.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Oblivious to Pain
active_or_passive_rules.description: When the berserker suffers a wound, roll a D6. On a 6, the wound is ignored.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Impervious to Bow-fire
active_or_passive_rules.description: The berserkers Defence is 6 against enemy shooting attacks

active_or_passive_rules.name: We will die for Saruman
active_or_passive_rules.description: All Wild Men of Dunland included in the same army as the Oathmaker gain the Isengard keyword.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Bloodoath
active_or_passive_rules.description: Friendly Wild Men of Dunland within 6" of the Oathmaker gain the Fearless special rule.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Lord of the West
active_or_passive_rules.description: Re-roll a single D6 in the Duel roll. Also re-roll a single D6 in To Wound roll.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Lord of Lorien
active_or_passive_rules.description: Celeborn's Stand Fast! Is 12" rather than 6".

active_or_passive_rules.name: Powers of Nature
active_or_passive_rules.description: If the Stormcaller rolls a 6 during a Cast roll, they may refund the Will points spent in that roll.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Nenya
active_or_passive_rules.description: Galadriel can re-roll her dice when using Fate points.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Lady of Lothlorien*
active_or_passive_rules.description: She may spend a free point of Will each turn.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Mirror of Galadriel
active_or_passive_rules.description: Heavy object with Defence 8 and 3 Wounds. At the end of each phase, one hero model within 6" may restore all their Fate points.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Caras Galadhon Fighting Style
active_or_passive_rules.description: In addition to the normal rules for pikes, they may also use the rules for shielding. The usual restrictions for shielding still apply, chiefly that a Guard of the Galadhrim Court that is shielding cannot be supported by another model, not even by another Guard of the Galadhrim Court.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Allies 'til the end
active_or_passive_rules.description: When within 12" of either Aragorn or Theoden, Haldir counts as being in range of a banner, and passes all courage tests.

active_or_passive_rules.name: One Final Blow
active_or_passive_rules.description: When slain in close combat, Haldir can make a Strength 4 strike against all enemy models engaged with him.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Whirl of Blades
active_or_passive_rules.description: If Orophin rolls one or more natural 6s in the Duel roll, then any dice that roll a natural 6 will make double the number of strikes when rolling To Wound. Note that any strikes doubled in this way will not double again if the model Orophin is fighting is Trapped.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Swift Parry
active_or_passive_rules.description: May force opponent to re-roll one dice in their duel roll. Must be done before any might points are used.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Wood Elf spear
active_or_passive_rules.description: This spear may also parry, which uses the rules for Shielding.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Enchanting Song
active_or_passive_rules.description: When not in combat, a Sentinel may sing one song per turn.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Hymn of Elbereth (Song - 12")
active_or_passive_rules.description: Target friendly model will pass all Courage tests for the rest of this turn.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Eldamar Madrigal (Song - 12")
active_or_passive_rules.description: Target enemy model must take a Courage test. If failed, you can move the model it's maximum move distance, even if it has already moved. You cannot move it in any way where an action is required (e.g. Jumping, Charging).

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Lay of Gondolin (Song)
active_or_passive_rules.description: Sentinel gains Terror for rest of the turn.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Wood Elf spear
active_or_passive_rules.description: This spear may also parry, which uses the rules for Shielding.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Lethal Aim
active_or_passive_rules.description: Each turn, Anborn may spend a point of Might without reducing his store (even with no Might remaining) to modify either a To Hit, In the Way or To Wound roll.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Anduril, Flame of the West
active_or_passive_rules.description: Never requires more than a 4 for To Wound rolls.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Stand Men of the West!
active_or_passive_rules.description: Friendly models within 6" count as being in range of a banner.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Short Range
active_or_passive_rules.description: The Avenger Bolt Thrower has a range of 24".

active_or_passive_rules.name: Rapid Fire
active_or_passive_rules.description: Can perform D6 shooting attacks each turn.

additional_text: Crewed by three Warriors of Minas Tirith, with armour and sword.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Horn of Gondor
active_or_passive_rules.description: If outnumbered, enemy with highest courage must take a courage test. If they fail, Boromir wins the duel.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Banner of Minas Tirith
active_or_passive_rules.description: This is a banner with a range of 6". Boromir and all Gondor Warriors within 6" gain +1 Fight value. Boromir does not suffer the -1 penalty for using a banner in the Duel Roll. Additionally, he may not carry this banner if he is also carrying a lance.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Boldest of the Bold
active_or_passive_rules.description: Receives a +2 bonus to his Courage when charging a model with the Terror special rule. Also receives this bonus when a model with the Blades of the Dead special rule makes strikes against him.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The rule of Gondor is mine, and no others!
active_or_passive_rules.description: Denethor must be your leader, unless your army contains Aragorn, King Elessar.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Broken Mind
active_or_passive_rules.description: At the start of every turn, take a courage test. If failed, Denethor is controlled by the opposing player for that turn. Friendly models cannot target him with shooting or magic, and cannot make strikes if they win a duel against him. Denethor will automatically pass this test if Boromir is in your army and alive. If Boromir is slain, Denethor will automatically fail the next test he must take for this rule.

active_or_passive_rules.name: A Fool's Challenge
active_or_passive_rules.description: Earnur must always charge an enemy hero if he able to do so. Additionally, he may never decline a Heroic Challenge.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Master Duelist
active_or_passive_rules.description: At the start of a fight involving Earnur, after resolving any special rules that affect an enemy model's Fight value, but before Heroic Strikes are resolved, Earnur may increase his Fight value to match that of a single non-monster enemy he is engaged with.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Is there a Captain here who still has the courage to do his Lord's will?
active_or_passive_rules.description: If Denethor is alive and in the same army, Faramir passes all courage tests and must always charge an enemy if he is able to do so.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Glamdring
active_or_passive_rules.description: Gandalf's strength is 5 when making strikes with Glamdring.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Narya
active_or_passive_rules.description: Gandalf may re-roll his dice when making fate rolls.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Indirect Fire
active_or_passive_rules.description: Always fires using Volley Fire, with a range of 12" - 96".

active_or_passive_rules.name: Area Effect
active_or_passive_rules.description: If a Battlefield target is hit, all models within 2" also suffer one Strength 5 hit and are knocked prone.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Wall-breaker
active_or_passive_rules.description: When rolling To Wound against a Siege target, you may roll two dice and pick the highest.

additional_text: Crewed by three Warriors of Minas Tirith, with armour and sword.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Warden's Sword
active_or_passive_rules.description: Master Forged hand-and-a-half sword.

active_or_passive_rules.name: In Defence of the King
active_or_passive_rules.description: Whilst within 3" of Denethor or Aragorn, King Elessar, Hurin gains Fearless and may re-roll a single D6 in Duel rolls.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Lines of Command
active_or_passive_rules.description: Your opponent cannot score Victory Points for slaying the enemy leader if Hurin is alive and your leader is a Gondor Hero.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Resolute Fighter
active_or_passive_rules.description: Ingold and friendly Gondor Warrior models within 3" do not Back Away if they lose a fight - your opponent must back away instead.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Defend the White City
active_or_passive_rules.description: Irolas may use the Shielding special rule, even without a shield. If he wins a Duel whilst Shielding, he may make a single Strength 4 Strike against one enemy model from the same fight.

active_or_passive_rules.name: White Sword of Gondor
active_or_passive_rules.description: This is a two handed sword, and strikes made with this sword also have the Mighty Blow special rule.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Bladelord's Skill
active_or_passive_rules.description: If a natural 6 is rolled in a duel, do not apply the penalty for using a two-handed weapon.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Birdcalls
active_or_passive_rules.description: Mablung and any Rangers (including Faramir, Madril, Damrod and Anborn) within 6" gain Stalk Unseen. Additionally, enemy models targeted with a shooting attack by Mablung or any Rangers do not benefit from Stalk Unseen, if they have it.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Master of Ambush
active_or_passive_rules.description: When rolling for Reinforcements, you may modify the roll for Madril's warband by +1 or -1. If he is already on the board, you may modify any warband's Reinforcement roll in the same army. When rolling for where warbands deploy on the board, you may modify the dice roll by +1 or -1.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Loyalty to the Captains
active_or_passive_rules.description: If this model is within 6" of Boromir or Faramir, they receive +1 Fight value.

active_or_passive_rules.name: For the Dark Lord!
active_or_passive_rules.description: While at least one friendly Ringwraith model is on the battlefield, the Black Guard's Courage value is 6.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Orcish Brawler
active_or_passive_rules.description: If outnumbered in a fight, Gorbag gains +1 to both his Fight and Attack value. Supporting models do not count towards being outnumbered.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Come here Maggot!
active_or_passive_rules.description: If Goroth suffers a Wound that would slay him (after all Fate points are spent), he may roll a D6. On a 2+, he may select a friendly Mordor Orc model within 1" to take the Wound instead.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Gothmog's Right Hand
active_or_passive_rules.description: If Gothmog's Enforcer is within 3" of Gothmog at the start of a turn, Gothmog may spend one of Gothmog's Enforcer's Will points to declare a Heroic Move, instead of spending his own Might points.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Time of the Orc has Come
active_or_passive_rules.description: (Once per game) At the start of any fight phase, all friendly Mordor Orc models within 12" may re-roll failed To Wound rolls.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Age of Men is Over
active_or_passive_rules.description: Gothmog and all friendly Mordor Orc models within 3" gain the Hatred (Man) special rule.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Trample
active_or_passive_rules.description: When the Great Beast Tramples, it will inflict two S6 hits.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Battle Platform
active_or_passive_rules.description: Models within the Howdah do not count towards your Bow Limit.

additional_text: Crewed by an Orc Commander with armour and spear, and nine Orc Warriors with armour and Orc bows.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Master of Reserves
active_or_passive_rules.description: When rolling for Reinforcements, you may modify the roll for Guritz' warband by +1 or -1. If he is already on the board, you may modify any warband's Reinforcement roll in the same army. When rolling for where warbands deploy on the board, you may modify the dice roll by +1 or -1.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Heart of Darkness
active_or_passive_rules.description: At the start of the priority phase, before any dice are rolled, Kardush can kill a friendly Orc model within 6", and regain D3 Will points. Cannot take his Will points above their starting level.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Shadow Pawn
active_or_passive_rules.description: At the start of the priority phase, before any dice are rolled, Kardush can be sacrificed and allow a single friendly Ringwraith within 6" to regain D6 Will points. Cannot take their Will points above their starting level.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Essence Leech
active_or_passive_rules.description: Khamul regains one point of Will for each wound he causes with his strikes. He cannot exceed the 12 points of Will he starts with. At the start of a fight phase, he may choose to spend one point of Will to increase either his Fight, Strength or Attack by 1, for the remainder of that fight.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Power from Death
active_or_passive_rules.description: Muzgur regains one Will Point each time he slays an enemy model in combat.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Bone-breaker
active_or_passive_rules.description: This is a mace, and enemy models do not receive any bonus from Elven-made weapons when fighting against Razgush.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Beasts of Mirkwood
active_or_passive_rules.description: Orc Captains in the same army may lead Bat Swarms, Mirkwood Spiders, Giant Spiders and Fell Wargs in their warbands.

active_or_passive_rules.name: War Leader of the North
active_or_passive_rules.description: Razgush's warband may only include Orc Warriors, Warg Riders, Bat Swarms, Mirkwood Spiders, Giant Spiders and Fell Wargs. Orc Captains, Orc Warriors and Warg Riders also gain Hatred (Elf).

active_or_passive_rules.name: Shield of Cirith Ungol
active_or_passive_rules.description: When Shagrat charges, he gains the Knock to Ground bonus as if he were a Calvary model.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Master of Poisons
active_or_passive_rules.description: At the start of the Move phase, he may spend one point of Will to activate this ability. For the rest of this turn, all friendly models within 6" with Poisoned Weapons rule may re-roll failed To Wound rolls made with those weapons.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Rule Through Fear
active_or_passive_rules.description: At the start of a fight phase, he may choose to spend one point of Will to turn himself into a banner for all friendly Warrior models within 6", for the rest of that turn.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Armour of the Sundered Land
active_or_passive_rules.description: Only loses a point of Will if he loses the Duel roll in a Fight.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Combat Mimicry
active_or_passive_rules.description: At the start of a fight phase, he may choose to spend one point of Will to use the Fight, Strength and/or Attack of his opponent. He does not need to adopt all three characteristics.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Pall of Darkness
active_or_passive_rules.description: At the start of the Move phase, he may choose to spend one point of Will to activate this ability. For the rest of this turn, all shots against himself or any friendly models within 6” will only hit on a 6.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Arcana Leech
active_or_passive_rules.description: At the start of the Move phase, he may spend one point of Will to activate this ability. For the rest of this turn, he regains one Will point for each successful Magical Power cast within 6" of him.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Eternal Willpower
active_or_passive_rules.description: The Undying may spend Will points for Fate rolls.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Reckless Fighter
active_or_passive_rules.description: At the start of his Fight before any dice are rolled, Zagdush may choose to increase his Strength by 1 but decrease his Defence by 1, until the end of the Fight.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Death-touch
active_or_passive_rules.description: Any model that wounds, or is wounded by Ahshrak must roll a D6. On a 4+, they suffer the effects of Paralyse.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Poison Blood
active_or_passive_rules.description: May include Giant Spiders in his warband. Giant Spiders in the same force can be upgraded to Venom-back spiders for 2 points, and gain Venom special rule.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Spider-kin
active_or_passive_rules.description: Only Spider models may benefit from Ashrak's Stand Fast!, Heroic Actions, and Shroud of Shadows magical power.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Blinding Swarm
active_or_passive_rules.description: The Fight value of any enemy model engaged in combat with a Bat Swarm is halved (rounding down).

active_or_passive_rules.name: Protect the Nest
active_or_passive_rules.description: At the start of the game, place a 25mm Nest marker. Whilst within 3" of the Nest, Cave Drake gains the Fearless special rule.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Gaping Maw
active_or_passive_rules.description: Instead of striking as normal, select a single Man-sized (or smaller model) and roll a D6. On a 3+, the model is swallowed whole and slain. The enemy model can still use Fate to prevent the attack and not be slain.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Master of the Dark Wild
active_or_passive_rules.description: Druzhag may include Wild Wargs, Fell Wargs, Giant Spiders and Bat Swarms in his warband. All friendly Bat, Warg and Spider models within 12" may use Druzhag's Courage value instead of their own. Additionally, his Fury power will affect himself and any model that is a Bat, Warg or Spider.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Iron Fist
active_or_passive_rules.description: Durburz's Stand Fast! has a range of 12"

active_or_passive_rules.name: Murderous Power
active_or_passive_rules.description: Whenever a Dweller in the Dark slays an enemy model in combat, it regains a single Wound lost earlier in the battle. Rend is the only Brutal Power Attack that this effect also applies to.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Mithril Crown
active_or_passive_rules.description: At the start of the Fight phase, before Heroic Actions are declared, roll a D6. On a 4+, all Moria Goblins within 3" gain +1 Fight value for the rest of that turn.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Take up the Drum
active_or_passive_rules.description: If a Drummer or Bearer is slain, they may pass on their wargear to any unengaged Moria Blackshield within 1".

active_or_passive_rules.name: Run and Drum
active_or_passive_rules.description: If Drummer and Bearer are in base contact, the drum is playing.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Doom! Doom!
active_or_passive_rules.description: Drum effects found on page 161 of Armies of LOTR book.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Destroy the Drum
active_or_passive_rules.description: Any model that spends a turn in base contact with a drum without doing anything else (such as shooting) may destroy the drum.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Take up the Drum
active_or_passive_rules.description: If a Drummer is slain, they may pass on their wargear to any unengaged Moria Goblin Warrior within 1".

active_or_passive_rules.name: Drums in the Deep
active_or_passive_rules.description: A Drummer must be in contact with the drum, and not Engaged. Drum effects found on page 161 of Armies of LOTR book.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Fiery Lash
active_or_passive_rules.description: Range 8", S7, and pulls model into base contact with The Balrog.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Goblin Mastery
active_or_passive_rules.description: Moria Goblins within 12" automatically pass Courage tests.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Flame of Udun
active_or_passive_rules.description: If an enemy is Wounded, roll D6. On 6, the model is Set Ablaze.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Demon of the Ancient World
active_or_passive_rules.description: May call a free Heroic Combat each turn.

active_or_passive_rules.name: From the Deep
active_or_passive_rules.description: See page 159 of Armies of LOTR book.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Many Tentacles
active_or_passive_rules.description: At 3 Wounds or less, The Watcher's Attack value becomes 3.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Tentacles
active_or_passive_rules.description: The Watcher can make D6 shooting attacks, range 6" and S3, with no In The Way tests. Models hit are dragged into base contact.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Water Dweller
active_or_passive_rules.description: Whilst within water, The Watcher's Move distance is doubled, and gains the Monstrous Charge special rule.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Gaping Maw
active_or_passive_rules.description: Whilst within water, The Watcher can choose a single Man-sized (or smaller) model and instantly slay them unless saved with Fate. The Watcher is removed from the board and needs to re-arrive as per the From the Deep special rule.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Lethal Union
active_or_passive_rules.description: Whilst Goblins remain mounted, entire model gains Terror, and +1 Courage. In combat, the model makes +1 Attack for each Goblin still mounted after the first, as long as they didn't shoot.

active_or_passive_rules.name: On the Hunt
active_or_passive_rules.description: Goblins mounted with Orc bows can still fire even after the Warg Marauder has moved its full distance.

additional_text: Whilst the Goblin with a sheild is still alive, the entire model gains +1 Defence.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Blood of Numenor
active_or_passive_rules.description: This model gains the Resistant to Magic special rule whilst within 6" of Elendil, Isildur or Anarion.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Unbending Resolve
active_or_passive_rules.description: Elendil permanently has Fortify Spirit cast upon him.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Narsil
active_or_passive_rules.description: A Master-forged hand-and-a-half sword, and may call a Heroic Combat each turn for free.

active_or_passive_rules.name: High King of Gondor and Arnor
active_or_passive_rules.description: Elendil's Stand Fast! Is 12" rather than 6".

active_or_passive_rules.name: Blood of Numenor
active_or_passive_rules.description: This model gains the Resistant to Magic special rule whilst within 6" of Elendil, Isildur or Anarion.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Ring
active_or_passive_rules.description: If your force does not contain Elendil or Anarion, Isildur may carry The Ring

active_or_passive_rules.name: Blood of Numenor
active_or_passive_rules.description: This model gains the Resistant to Magic special rule whilst within 6" of Elendil, Isildur or Anarion.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Skin-changer
active_or_passive_rules.description: To change Beorn's form, you may roll a D6 at the start of Beorn's Move. On a 4+, Beorn transforms into a man. Might may be used to influence this roll. Beorn may then continue his move as normal, including making Charges. Beorn cannot change form if an enemy model is in base contact with him.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Berserk
active_or_passive_rules.description: Beorn the Bear must always Charge an enemy if able. Additionally, he may not use the Stand Fast! or Heroic Actions of other models, and other models may not use his own, whilst in bear form.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Crushing Strength
active_or_passive_rules.description: If Beorn wins a Duel, instead of striking as normal, choose a single model in the fight to target a Strength 10 hit. If the To Wound roll is successful, the target suffers another Strength 10 hit, and so on, until the target is dead or Beorn fails to wound his victim.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Skin-changer
active_or_passive_rules.description: To change Beorn's form, you may roll a D6 at the start of Beorn's Move. On a 4+, Beorn transforms into a bear. Might may be used to influence this roll. Beorn may then continue his move as normal, including making Charges. Beorn cannot change form if an enemy model is in base contact with him.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Sebastian
active_or_passive_rules.description: Extra attack in close combat, with Fight 1 and Strength 1. Cannot be altered with Might.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Master of Birds
active_or_passive_rules.description: Radagast always has Line of Sight to any point on the battlefield. Eagle models within 12" gain Resistant to Magic. If he dismounts a Great Eagle, the eagle automatically passes its Courage test.

active_or_passive_rules.name: One with Nature
active_or_passive_rules.description: Whilst he has the Infantry keyword, Radagast gains Stalk Unseen and may move through difficult terrain without penalty.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Shipwright's Power
active_or_passive_rules.description: Cirdan may spend a single point of Will each turn for free.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Twin Elven Blades
active_or_passive_rules.description: You can either choose to use a single sword, which acts as if it were a two-handed sword. Or they can fight with both swords for +1 Attack. They can also parry, which counts as Shielding.

active_or_passive_rules.name: One Final Blow
active_or_passive_rules.description: If one brother is killed, the surviving brother gains +1 Strength and +1 Defence, and passes all courage tests. See Page 77 for details on pursuing the model that defeated their brother.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Twin Elven Blades
active_or_passive_rules.description: You can either choose to use a single sword, which acts as if it were a two-handed sword. Or they can fight with both swords for +1 Attack. They can also parry, which counts as Shielding.

active_or_passive_rules.name: One Final Blow
active_or_passive_rules.description: If one brother is killed, the surviving brother gains +1 Strength and +1 Defence, and passes all courage tests. See Page 77 for details on pursuing the model that defeated their brother.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Hadhafang
active_or_passive_rules.description: Hand-and-a-half sword, +1 To Wound when striking Spirit models.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Vilya
active_or_passive_rules.description: You may re-roll your dice when using Fate points

active_or_passive_rules.name: Lord of the West
active_or_passive_rules.description: You may re-roll one dice in both the Duel roll and rolling To Wound.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Foresight of the Eldar
active_or_passive_rules.description: D6 Foresight points, each point can alter opponents priority by +1/-1.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Noldorin Daggers
active_or_passive_rules.description: Elven-made daggers, may be used as Throwing weapons. May re-roll failed To Wound rolls when throwing or making strikes with these daggers.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Aiglos
active_or_passive_rules.description: Elven-made spear, add +1 to all To Wound rolls.

active_or_passive_rules.name: High King of the Elves
active_or_passive_rules.description: His Stand Fast! is 12", and includes friendly Elf Hero models.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Lord of the West
active_or_passive_rules.description: May re-roll a single D6 in both Duel Rolls and To Wound rolls.

additional_text: King's Guard (upgrade for High Elf Warriors) in Gil-Galad's warband have Fight Value 6
Noldorin Exiles (upgrade for Wood Elf Warriors) in Gildor's warband have Move 8"

active_or_passive_rules.name: Armour of Gondolin
active_or_passive_rules.description: Heavy armour, monsters may not use brutal power attacks against Glorfindel if he equips this.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Unbending Resolve
active_or_passive_rules.description: Glorfindel permanently has the Fortify Spirit spell cast upon him.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Lord of the West
active_or_passive_rules.description: Re-roll a single D6 in the Duel roll. Also re-roll a single D6 in To Wound roll.

additional_text: If Glorfindel is mounted upon Asfaloth, he gains the Fleetfoot special rule.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Powers of Nature
active_or_passive_rules.description: If the Stormcaller rolls a 6 during a Cast roll, they may refund the Will points spent in that roll.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Song of Elbereth
active_or_passive_rules.description: All friendly Rivendell models within 6" of Lindir gain the Resistant to Magic special rule.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Wise Council
active_or_passive_rules.description: If Lindir is within 6" of Elrond, then Elrond may spend a single point of Will each turn for free, even if he has none remaining.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Unsteady nerves
active_or_passive_rules.description: Aldor must always shoot first in the Shoot phase, even before Heroic Shoots are resolved.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Lucky Shot
active_or_passive_rules.description: Aldor must re-roll failed To Hit and To Wound rolls with his bow.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Arise Riders of Theoden!
active_or_passive_rules.description: If within 12" of Theoden, and riding a horse, this model receives +1 bonus to their Fight value on a turn in which they Charge.

active_or_passive_rules.name: For Theoden
active_or_passive_rules.description: If Theoden is Engaged in a Fight within 12", Deorwine may call a Heroic Combat for free. If the action is successful, you must use the following move to join Theoden's combat, or get as close as possible to him.

additional_text: Whilst Merry remains a passenger, Dernhelm gains the Resistant to Magic special rule, and Merry may use his own Might points to affect Dernhelm's rolls or declare Heroic Actions.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Pinpoint Accuracy
active_or_passive_rules.description: Elfhem may re-roll To Hit, To Wound and In The Way rolls when using a throwing spear, and never suffers the -1 penalty when moving and shooting with a throwing spear.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Price of Grief
active_or_passive_rules.description: If Theoden or Eowyn are in the same army, and either are slain, Eomer adds +1 on all To Wound rolls for the rest of the game, and he must charge if able to do so.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Legendary Hero
active_or_passive_rules.description: The first time each turn that Eorl the Young spends a Might point, roll a D6. On a 4+, the point of Might is free.

active_or_passive_rules.name: I Shall Kill You if You Touch Him
active_or_passive_rules.description: If Theoden is slain, Eowyn must move towards the spot where he died if she can. Once she's within 3" of this spot, she must remain within 3" of it. Then for rest of the game, she becomes Fearless, re-rolls any failed To Wound rolls, and gains +1 To Wound when striking the model that slew Theoden.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Horn of the Hammerhand
active_or_passive_rules.description: This is a war horn that adds +2 Courage rather than +1, but only affects friendly Rohan models.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Royal Standard of Rohan
active_or_passive_rules.description: As well as being a banner, a single Rohan Hero model with no Might left and within 3" may regain 1 Might point. Cannot regain Might beyond a Hero's starting level. Gamling suffers no penalties for carrying this banner.

additional_text: Helmingas (upgrade for Warriors of Rohan) in your army have Strength 4.

active_or_passive_rules.name: There is Always Hope
active_or_passive_rules.description: Haleth has an Attack value of 2 whilst within 6" of Aragorn.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Fight to the Last
active_or_passive_rules.description: If Haleth is engaged in combat, Aragorn and friendly Rohan Infantry models within 6" gain +1 Fight value. This ends immediately if Haleth is slain.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Horn of the Hammerhand
active_or_passive_rules.description: A War Horn, which causes Terror when he charges into combat.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Inspiring Presence
active_or_passive_rules.description: Rohan Warrior models within 6" gain +1 Fight value.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Hammerhand
active_or_passive_rules.description: May choose to use his fists instead of his sword, in which case he may use Bash special strike, and never counts as unarmed.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Arise, Riders of Theoden!
active_or_passive_rules.description: If this model is within 12" of Theoden and on a horse, it receives +1 bonus to it's fight value on a turn in which they Charge.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Riders of Eorl

active_or_passive_rules.name: Reckless Charge
active_or_passive_rules.description: Theodred must Charge enemy models if able to so. Additionally, when he charges, re-roll any failed To Wound rolls in that fight.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Put 'em in Chains
active_or_passive_rules.description: Instead of making Strikes, Sid may choose a Hobbit model and roll a D6. If higher than the Hobbit's Strength, the Hobbit is bound in chains, treated as if it had suffered the Paralyse Magic Power.

active_or_passive_rules.description: Once per game, if within 1" of a building or woodland terrain, roll a D6. On 3+, it is set on fire. Any model touching it must roll a D6. On 4+, they are Set Ablaze.

active_or_passive_rules.name: At 'em Lads!
active_or_passive_rules.description: A Ruffian that is Engaged in a Fight that involves one or more Hobbits gains +1 Fight value. Additionally, instead of making Strikes, a Ruffian may choose one Hobbit model and roll a D6. If it's higher than the Hobbit's Strength, the Hobbit is bound in chains, treated as if it had suffered the Paralyse Magic Power.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Whoever Strikes me shall be Accursed
active_or_passive_rules.description: After an enemy makes strikes against Sharkey, they must take a Courage test. If failed, they suffer one Strength 4 hit.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Chief
active_or_passive_rules.description: Worm is always the first follower in Sharkey's warband.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Broken Loyalties
active_or_passive_rules.description: If Sharkey has 1 Wound and no Fate, Worm must move towards or attack Sharkey. If Sharkey is slain, Worm returns to normal.

active_or_passive_rules.name: When he Sneaks
active_or_passive_rules.description: If no other enemy models can see Worm and those he is fighting with, Worm increases to Fight 4 and Attack 3.

active_or_passive_rules.description: Never counts as being unarmed.

active_or_passive_rules.description: If his great bow hits, he may shoot at another target within 3". If the second shot hits, he can shoot again, up to three shots total.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Black Arrow
active_or_passive_rules.description: May fire a Black Arrow once per game from a Windlance. Re-roll failed To Hit and In The Way rolls. A successful To Hit roll against a Battlefield target counts as an instant Dead On! result.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Saviour of Lake-town
active_or_passive_rules.description: Bard's Stand Fast! has range of 6". Additionally Bain, Percy, Hilda, Lake-town Militia and Lake-town Militia Captains within 6" gain +1 Fight value and count as being in range of a banner.
