active_or_passive_rules.description: Easterlings can use pike and shield without penalty. If an Easterling model loses a duel roll on foot, up to two other models that also have the Phalanx rule can Make Way, instead of one.

active_or_passive_rules.description: While mounted, gain the Shield-wall rule. The +1 Defence applies to both rider and mount. Hero models don't need a shield.

active_or_passive_rules.description: May only include Black Dragons or Dragon Cult Acolytes in his warband.

active_or_passive_rules.description: Easterlings can use pike and shield without penalty. If an Easterling model loses a duel roll on foot, up to two other models that also have the Phalanx rule can Make Way, instead of one.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Gleaming Horde
active_or_passive_rules.description: While mounted, gain the Shieldwall rule. The +1 Defence applies to both rider and mount. Hero models don't need a shield.

additional_text: The Easterling battle stave can be used as a spear or two-handed weapon.

additional_text: Black Dragons (upgrade for Easterling Warriors) have Fight 4 and Courage 4.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Slow-acting Venom
active_or_passive_rules.description: Any model that suffers a wound from a Rhunish War Drake but is not slain, reduces their Fight and Attack value by 1 (to a minimum of 1) for the remainder of the game. This effect does not stack on the same model between wounds from different War Drakes.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Standards of the Emperor
active_or_passive_rules.description: A banner with range 12". The Dragon Emperor and Black Dragons do not suffer -1 penalty in Duel rolls.

active_or_passive_rules.name: In the Name of the Dragon Emperor
active_or_passive_rules.description: Friendly Easterling Warrior models within 6" of the Palanquin and have line of sight of it, gain +1 to their Fight value.

active_or_passive_rules.name: *Black Dragons (Royal Palanquin)
active_or_passive_rules.description: If the Dragon Emperor wins a fight, the Black Dragons can contribute a number of strikes equal to the remaining wounds of the Palanquin. If the Dragon Emperor is slain or dismounts, replace the Palanquin with a number of Black Dragons equal to it's remaining wounds.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Movement (Royal Palanquin)
active_or_passive_rules.description:
3+ Wounds - 6"
2 wounds - 3"
1 wound - No movement

active_or_passive_rules.name: Phalanx
active_or_passive_rules.description: Easterlings can use pike and shield without penalty. If an Easterling model loses a duel roll on foot, up to two other models that also have the Phalanx rule can Make Way, instead of one.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Show No Mercy
active_or_passive_rules.description: When making strikes against trapped enemy models, you may re-roll failed To Wound rolls.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Emperor's Glaive
active_or_passive_rules.description: Elven-made spear, may use Feint special strike, and Shielding special rule. May not support whilst mounted on Palanquin.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Emperor of the Easterlings
active_or_passive_rules.description: His Stand Fast! has unlimited range, and affects hero models.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Helm of the Dragon Emperor
active_or_passive_rules.description: The Emperor is Resistant to Magic.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Anduril, Flame of the West
active_or_passive_rules.description: Never requires more than a 4 for To Wound rolls.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Official Meals
active_or_passive_rules.description: Hobbit models treat Bill the Pony as a banner.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Second Breakfast
active_or_passive_rules.description: Each turn, one Fellowship model in base contact with Bill can roll a D6. On a 5+, they may restore 1 point of Might, Will or Fate.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Only a Pony
active_or_passive_rules.description: May never charge, and no other models can benefit from his Stand Fast!. However, he can benefit from any Hobbit hero's Stand Fast!

active_or_passive_rules.name: Horn of Gondor
active_or_passive_rules.description: If outnumbered, enemy with highest courage must take a courage test. If they fail, Boromir wins the duel.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Mithril Coat
active_or_passive_rules.description: Frodo gains +3 Defence whilst wearing the Mithril Coat.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Sting
active_or_passive_rules.description: An Elven-made dagger, Frodo gains +1 Strength when making strikes with Sting.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Glamdring
active_or_passive_rules.description: Gandalf's strength is 5 when making strikes with Glamdring.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Narya
active_or_passive_rules.description: Gandalf may re-roll his dice when making fate rolls.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Axes of the Dwarves!
active_or_passive_rules.description: At the beginning of a fight, you can choose his two-handed axe, or an axe in each hand which gives him an Attack value of 3.

active_or_passive_rules.name: I myself am sitting pretty on 43
active_or_passive_rules.description: If Gimli has fewer kills than Legolas, he gets +1 To Wound rolls.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Dead Shot
active_or_passive_rules.description: Can fire three shots in the shoot phase. Alternatively can make one shot that will always hit on 2+, regardless of In The Way tests (or if model is engaged in combat) and for Calvary models, he may choose whether he hits the rider or mount.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Final Count, 42
active_or_passive_rules.description: If Legolas has fewer kills than Gimli, his shoot value becomes 2+.

active_or_passive_rules.name: For the Shire!
active_or_passive_rules.description: If Merry is within 3" of Boromir of Gondor, Merry may spend his Might points as if they were his own.

active_or_passive_rules.name: For the Shire!
active_or_passive_rules.description: If Merry is within 3" of Boromir of Gondor, Merry may spend his Might points as if they were his own.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Let him go or I'll have you, Longshanks!
active_or_passive_rules.description: If Frodo is Engaged in a Fight within 6" of Sam, then Sam may call a Heroic Combat for free. If the action is successful, Sam must use the following move to join Frodo's combat, or move as close as possible to Frodo.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Serve the Master of the Precious
active_or_passive_rules.description: Smeagol may only be taken if Frodo is also in the army.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Broadsword
active_or_passive_rules.description: Two handed sword, and if they roll a natural 6 in the Duel roll, this model does not suffer the usual -1 penalty.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Chief of Lamedon
active_or_passive_rules.description: Clansmen of Lamedon within 6" of Angbor gain the Fearless special rule.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Axe of Lossarnach
active_or_passive_rules.description: This weapon can be used as either a spear or two-handed axe.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Dead-eye Shot
active_or_passive_rules.description: When benefiting from a Heroic Shoot, this model may re-roll failed To Wound rolls when making shooting attacks.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Pride of Dol Amroth
active_or_passive_rules.description: Whilst within 3" of Prince Imrahil, add +1 to Fight value.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Go for the Eyes!
active_or_passive_rules.description: Duinhir can re-roll failed To Wound rolls when shooting. Also, wounds against Monsters whilst shooting cause D3 wounds rather than one.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Lord of the Blackroot Vale
active_or_passive_rules.description: Blackroot Vale Archers within 6" of Duinhir may re-roll To Hit rolls of 1, as long as they didn't move during the Move phase.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Lord of Lossarnach
active_or_passive_rules.description: Axemen of Lossarnach within 6" must re-roll results of a 1 when rolling To Wound during the Fight phase.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Pride of Dol Amroth

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Lineage of Numenor
active_or_passive_rules.description: Imrahil's Stand Fast! Is 12" rather than 6".

active_or_passive_rules.name: Dol Amroth for Gondor!
active_or_passive_rules.description: Friendly Fiefdom models within 12" of Imrahil count as being in range of a banner.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Lord of the Iron Hills
active_or_passive_rules.description: Iron Hills Dwarf models within 12" of Dain pass all Courage tests automatically.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Fiery Temper
active_or_passive_rules.description: After killing his first enemy, Dain must always Charge if able to do so for the rest of the game.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Fearsome Charge
active_or_passive_rules.description: When Dain Charges, he causes Terror for the rest of that turn.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Headbutt
active_or_passive_rules.description: If Dain wins a Duel but fails to slay his opponent, select one enemy Man-sized (or smaller) model and roll a D6. On a 5+, that model is Knocked to the Ground.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Old Twirly Whirlies
active_or_passive_rules.description: Ballista has a range of 12" - 48", follows the rules for Volley Fire, and always counts as declaring a Heroic Shoot. When a target is hit, draw a line between centre of ballista and target. For that turn, any shooting attacks of Strength 6 or less cannot be made if they cross that line, or the target is within 3" of the line. Similarly in both cases, shooting attacks above Strength 6 must roll a D6. On a 5+, the shot is prevented.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Tremendous Impact
active_or_passive_rules.description: If a hit is scored against a Battlefield Target, all Man-sized models (or smaller) within 2" are Knocked to the Ground. Cavalry models must take a Thrown Rider test. These models also suffer a Strength 4 hit.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Reliable
active_or_passive_rules.description: Will only scatter 3" rather than 6", may re-roll 1's To Hit.

additional_text: Crewed by four Iron Hill Dwarves, with heavy armour and sword.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Dwarven Crew
active_or_passive_rules.description: An Iron Hills Dwarf Warrior who ends their move in base contact with the Chariot may replace a slain crew member. They will immediately drop their spear, shield, mattock, crossbow or banner. If the driver is killed, another crew member may take their place. If all crew are slain, the Chariot is immediately removed as a casualty.

active_or_passive_rules.description: Master-forged two-handed axe, re-roll a single dice in duel rolls.

active_or_passive_rules.description: A war horn, that also gives Durin the Terror special rule.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Ring of Durin
active_or_passive_rules.description: Once per game, you may re-roll a single Priority roll.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Crown of Kings
active_or_passive_rules.description: For each wound he suffers, roll a D6. On a 6, the wound is ignored.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Accurate
active_or_passive_rules.description: A Dwarf Ballista will only scatter 3" rather than 6"

active_or_passive_rules.name: Piercing Shot
active_or_passive_rules.description: If a shot hits a target, then they suffer one S9 hit. Additionally, if the target is S5 or lower, they are knocked Prone and flung D6" directly away from the Ballista. Any model the target passes over is also knocked Prone and suffers one S6 hit. If the target hits impassable terrain, or a model that is S6 or higher, the target is knocked Prone and both the target and obstacle suffer one S6 hit.

additional_text: Crewed by two Dwarf Warriors, with heavy armour and axe.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Loremaster
active_or_passive_rules.description: At the start of his move, he can spend a point of Will to cancel an enemy Active or Passive special rule until the end of the turn. This has unlimited range, but Floi must have Line of Sight of the model.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Living Lore
active_or_passive_rules.description: Floi recovers 1 Will point every time a friendly Moria Dwarf model slays an enemy Hero or Monster model.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Herald's Duty
active_or_passive_rules.description: When two Heralds, or a Herald and the King's Champion are in base contact, both receive +1 to their Defence. If both Heralds and the Kings Champion are in all in base contact, they receive +2 instead.

special_rules.name: The Life Guard
special_rules.description: If the King's Champion is wounded, a Herald may spend his own Fate point, as long as he is in base contact with the Champion.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Torozul
active_or_passive_rules.description: This is a Foe Spear, with the Trollbane special rule. Additionally, Mardin adds +1 when rolling To Wound against Monster models.

active_or_passive_rules.name: In Defence of the King
active_or_passive_rules.description: At the start of the game, nominate a single Dwarf Hero model with the highest Heroic Tier to protect. If that model is within 3" and in a fight, the Shieldbearer may call a Heroic Combat without spending Might. If the Heroic combat is successful, they must use their following Move to either join the fight, or move as close as possible.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Lead by Example
active_or_passive_rules.description: Friendly Dwarf models within 12" may re-roll failed Courage tests.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Iron Shield
active_or_passive_rules.description: Cannot be barged or Hurled, and unaffected by Rend Brutal Power Attack.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Spear & Shield
active_or_passive_rules.description: Unless supported by a Foe Spear, suffers -1 to Duel roll.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Foe Spear
active_or_passive_rules.description: A spear, with a bonus of +1 To Wound on Monsters when supporting an Iron Shield

active_or_passive_rules.name: Lord of the Eagles
active_or_passive_rules.description: Only Eagle and Wizard models may benefit from Gwaihir's Stand Fast! or benefit from his Heroic Actions.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Banner of Arwen Evenstar
active_or_passive_rules.description: A banner that affects all friendly models within 6", and gain the Fearless special rule. Halbarad suffers no -1 penalty in Duel rolls.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Whip of the Masters
active_or_passive_rules.description: Each time a friendly Hero model within 6" (including himself) attempts a Heroic Move, March or Shoot, roll a D6. On a 4+, they may call that action for free.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Preternatural Agility
active_or_passive_rules.description: A Hasharin can never be trapped while still standing.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Serpent's Weapon
active_or_passive_rules.description: At the start of the game, secretly select one Hero model in the opponent's force to be Raza's target. If Raza is Engaged in a Fight with this target, his Fight value is increased by 2.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Serpent Banner
active_or_passive_rules.description: Banner with 6" range, and Suladan never suffers -1 penalty to duel rolls whilst carrying it.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Ascendant
active_or_passive_rules.description: Suladan's Stand Fast! is 12" rather than 6".

active_or_passive_rules.name: Riches Beyond Renown
active_or_passive_rules.description: When an enemy hero model within 12" takes a courage test, the Golden King may reduce that hero's courage by 1 for each Will point he chooses to spend. He may also wait until the Courage test has been rolled before choosing to spend Will points.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Golden Throne
active_or_passive_rules.description: This throne is a banner, and the King does not suffer the normal -1 penalty in Duel rolls.

additional_text: A War Mumak of Harad is comprised of a Haradrim Commander with armour and a war spear as the warband's captain, and the Mumak itself.
See page 194 of Armies of LOTR for additional special rules.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Awesome Presence
active_or_passive_rules.description: Friendly Haradrim and Mahud models within 3" may re-roll a Single D6 in the Duel Roll, and is cumulative with Banner re-rolls.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Trample
active_or_passive_rules.description: Inflicts three Strength 9 hits.

additional_stats.name: Howdah
additional_text: A War Mumak of Harad's Howdah has a capacity of 12 models, in addition to the commander. The only models that may ride within the Howdah are Haradrim Warriors, Serpent Guard and Watchers of Kama.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Twin Blades
active_or_passive_rules.description: Watcher of Karna gains Attack 2.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Steely Nerve
active_or_passive_rules.description: Gain a +2 bonus to any Courage test when charging an enemy with Terror. Also gain +2 bonus to the Watcher's Courage when an enemy model with Blades of the Dead makes strikes against the Watcher.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Champion Stone Skipper
active_or_passive_rules.description: Baldo may re-roll failed To Hit rolls on stone throws. If Baldo rolls a 6 on his To Hit roll, the enemy immediately suffers a Wound.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Master of Traps
active_or_passive_rules.description: At the start of the game, Baldo may place eight 25mm Trap markers on the board. These traps are described on page 64 of the Scouring of the Shire supplement book.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Grip, Fang and Wolf
active_or_passive_rules.description: Farmer Maggot is always accompanied by his loyal guard dogs. Grip, Fang and Wolf are automatically the first three members of Farmer Maggot's warband. They will always use his Courage value while he is alive.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Pitchfork
active_or_passive_rules.description: Hand-and-a-half weapon that may use the Stab Special Strike, and may support as if it was a spear.

active_or_passive_rules.name: "This is our Country"
active_or_passive_rules.description: Farmer Cotton and Hobbit models within 3" may re-roll 1s when rolling to win a Duel roll.

active_or_passive_rules.name: A Helpful Sort
active_or_passive_rules.description: If Folco is within 3" of Frodo at the start of a turn, Frodo may spend one of Folco's Will points to declare a Heroic Move, instead of using his own Might points.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Mithril Coat
active_or_passive_rules.description: Frodo adds +3 to his deference (already included in stats)

active_or_passive_rules.name: It will never really heal
active_or_passive_rules.description: Frodo never charge enemies, and makes no strikes in a Fight.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Home is the Hero
active_or_passive_rules.description: All Hobbit models within 6" count as being in range of a banner

active_or_passive_rules.name: Leave my Flowers Alone!
active_or_passive_rules.description: At the start of the game after deployments, Hamfast may place three 25mm Flower markers anywhere on the board. Any Hobbit model within 3" of Hamfast may re-roll stone throws or Strikes against enemies within 4" of a Flower. Enemy models may remove a Flower in the End phase if in base contact with it and did not Fight that turn. If they do so, Hamfast re-rolls failed To Wound rolls against that model for rest of the game.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Head Shirriff
active_or_passive_rules.description: Holfoot Bracegirdle, Robin Smallburrow and Hobbit Shirriffs within 3" of him do not suffer the penalty for using their clubs as two-handed weapons.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Furious Tirade
active_or_passive_rules.description: No Warrior models from either player's army may benefit from a Hero model's Stand Fast! whilst within 6" of Lobelia.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Umbrella is not Mightier than the Sword
active_or_passive_rules.description: Lobelia will never make Strikes if she wins a Fight.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Considerable Wealth
active_or_passive_rules.description:
Lotho may spend his Will points to pay off models around him, in the following three ways:

1. If an enemy charges Lotho, roll a D6. On a 3+, the model stops 1" away and may not Charge.

2. All friendly Ruffian models within 3" will automatically pass their next Courage test.

3. All friendly Hobbit models within 3" add +1 to their Fight value until the end of that turn.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Family Rivalry
active_or_passive_rules.description: Lotho cannot take part in any Heroic Actions from Bilbo or Frodo.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Horn of the Riddermark
active_or_passive_rules.description: Whilst carrying the horn, all Hobbit models gain +1 Courage. If Merry is slain, the horn is lost.

additional_text: Battlin' Brandybucks (upgrade for Hobbit Militia) in Merry's warband have Strength 3.

active_or_passive_rules.name: To me Shire-folk!
active_or_passive_rules.description: Paladin's Stand Fast! Only affects Hobbit models and has a range of 12".

additional_text: Tookish Hunters (upgrade for Hobbit Archers) in Paladin's warband have Fight 3/3+.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Against all Odds
active_or_passive_rules.description: Pippin may re-roll any failed To Wound rolls when striking against Monster or Hero models.

additional_text: Tookish Hunters (upgrade for Hobbit Archers) in Pippin's warband have Fight 3/3+.

active_or_passive_rules.name: A Nose for Shortcuts
active_or_passive_rules.description: When rolling for Reinforcements, you may modify the roll for Robin's warband by +1 or -1. When rolling for where Robin's warband deploys on the board, you may modify the dice roll by +1 or -1.

active_or_passive_rules.name: "If I were to marry anyone, it would've been her"
active_or_passive_rules.description: Whilst within 6" of Sam, he increases his Attacks to 2. Additionally, if within 4" of Sam, he may declare free Heroic Combats. If Rosie is engaged in a Fight, Sam must use this Heroic Combat to join her fight afterwards if possible, or move closer to her.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Sting
active_or_passive_rules.description: Elven-made dagger, adds +1 to Strength when making Strikes with Sting.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Mayor of Hobbiton
active_or_passive_rules.description: At the start of the Fight phase, Will Whitfoot can spend a point of Will. If he does so, friendly Hobbit models within 6" count as being in range of a banner.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Keep 'em for Later
active_or_passive_rules.description: If he wins a Fight, choose one man-sized (or smaller) model from the Fight. Replace that model with a 25mm marker. That model now counts as being subject to the Paralyse Magical Power.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Roast 'em Slowly
active_or_passive_rules.description: If he wins a Fight, he may perform this attack as long as he is within 6" of a fire. Choose an enemy model involved in the Fight and place it is base contact with the fire. The model is immediately Set Ablaze.

wargear: Club or knife (counts as a dagger)

active_or_passive_rules.name: Keep 'em for Later
active_or_passive_rules.description: If he wins a Fight, choose one man-sized (or smaller) model from the Fight. Replace that model with a 25mm marker. That model now counts as being subject to the Paralyse Magical Power.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Campfire
active_or_passive_rules.description: After forces are deployed, place the Campfire anywhere on the board, outside of your opponents deployment area. Bill, Tom and Bert gain Resistant to Magic and +1 Courage whilst within 6".

active_or_passive_rules.name: Mince 'em Fine
active_or_passive_rules.description: If he wins a Fight, choose one enemy model in the Fight. Both they and Bill roll a D6, and add their Strength values. If Bill's roll is higher, the victim suffers Wounds equal to the difference. Fate points may still be used to prevent each Wound. The victim still Backs Away, even if they win this roll.

wargear: Club or fork (counts as a dagger)

active_or_passive_rules.name: Keep 'em for Later
active_or_passive_rules.description: If he wins a Fight, choose one man-sized (or smaller) model from the Fight. Replace that model with a 25mm marker. That model now counts as being subject to the Paralyse Magical Power.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Lingering Cold
active_or_passive_rules.description: During a Fight that involves Tom, and before making a Duel roll, Tom may spend a Will point to halve the Fight value of a single victim in base contact as he sneezes on them.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Squash 'em to Jelly
active_or_passive_rules.description: If he wins a Fight, he use this attack instead of normal Strikes. Every enemy model involved in the same Fight (not counting Supporting models) suffers a Strength 6 hit. Any who survive are also knocked Prone.

wargear: Club or spoon (counts as a dagger)

active_or_passive_rules.name: Lord of the West
active_or_passive_rules.description: Re-roll a single D6 in the Duel roll. Also re-roll a single D6 in To Wound roll.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Lord of Lorien
active_or_passive_rules.description: Celeborn's Stand Fast! Is 12" rather than 6".

active_or_passive_rules.name: Nenya
active_or_passive_rules.description: Galadriel can re-roll her dice when using Fate points.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Light of Earendil
active_or_passive_rules.description: Shooting attacks against Galadriel or any model within 6" of her will only hit on a To Hit roll of a 6.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Lady of Lothlorien
active_or_passive_rules.description: Galadriel can spend a single point of Will each turn for free.

active_or_passive_rules.name: War Aspect
active_or_passive_rules.description: All enemies within 6" suffer -1 Courage, never counts as unarmed.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Consuming Rivalry
active_or_passive_rules.description: Saruman will never move as part of a Heroic Action called by Gandalf. Also, if Gandalf casts Strengthen Will on Saruman, it will have no effect.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Voice of Curunir
active_or_passive_rules.description: Saruman's Stand Fast! Range is 12", and affects hero models.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Lord of the Istari
active_or_passive_rules.description: Can re-roll one dice when making Casting or Resist tests.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Sword-mace
active_or_passive_rules.description: This weapon may use the Feint or Bash Special Strikes.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Longbeard
active_or_passive_rules.description: In the Priority phase, Balin may spend a Will point to enable his side to re-roll their D6 in the Priority Roll.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Boar spear
active_or_passive_rules.description: This weapon can be used as either a spear or two-handed weapon.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Embedded Axe-blade
active_or_passive_rules.description: If Bifur wins a fight, he may make a single Strike against his opponent. If he wounds them, the axe-blade is his skull is removed, and he may now call a free Heroic Move each turn.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Sting
active_or_passive_rules.description: Elven-made dagger, gain +1 Strength when making strikes.

active_or_passive_rules.name: It has not yet Awoken
active_or_passive_rules.description: Bilbo ignores Sauron's Will section of the One Ring rules. If Bilbo if the only model left on his side, he is not removed as a casualty if he is wearing the Ring.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Mattock
active_or_passive_rules.description: Two-handed weapon, which can use either Bash or Piercing Strike Special Strikes.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Steadfast
active_or_passive_rules.description: When targeted by a Magical Power or special rule, Bofur may roll a D6. On a 2+, its effects are ignored. Can be modified with Might. Bofur may only try to Resist a Magical Power before making his Steadfast roll.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Beefy
active_or_passive_rules.description: May use the Bash Special Strike, as if he were using a mace.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Lumbering
active_or_passive_rules.description: When making Jump or Climb tests, Bombur must re-roll results of 6. Additionally, he may not call Heroic Moves.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Raising Spirits
active_or_passive_rules.description: Once each turn in his Move phase, choose a friendly model in base contact and roll a D6. On a 4+, they regain a lost Will point.

active_or_passive_rules.name: A Good Sort Really
active_or_passive_rules.description: If Bilbo is within 3" of Dori, he may spend Dori's Might, Will and Fate points as if they were his own.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Weapon Master
active_or_passive_rules.description: Dwalin is never considered to be unarmed, and never suffers the -1 penalty in Duel rolls for fighting with a two-handed weapon.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Combat Synergy
active_or_passive_rules.description: If in base contact, Kili and Fili may swap places at the start of any phase, and does not count as moving.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Glamdring
active_or_passive_rules.description: Gandalf's strength is 5 when making strikes with Glamdring.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Narya
active_or_passive_rules.description: Gandalf may re-roll his dice when making fate rolls.

active_or_passive_rules.name: A Warrior Born
active_or_passive_rules.description: Gloin must re-roll scores of 1 To Wound in combat.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Combat Synergy
active_or_passive_rules.description: If in base contact, Kili and Fili may swap places at the start of any phase, and does not count as moving.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Weapon Master
active_or_passive_rules.description: Nori is never considered unarmed, and does not suffer the -1 penalty during Duel rolls when using a two-handed weapon.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Healing Herbs
active_or_passive_rules.description: Instead of moving in the Move phase, Oin may attempt to heal a friendly model he is in base contact with. Roll a D6. On 4 or 5, the model regains one Wound. On a 6, they regain all Wounds.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Prognostication
active_or_passive_rules.description: Once per Fight phase, Oin can use a Will point to enable a friendly model within 3" to re-roll one dice in their Duel roll.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Chronicler
active_or_passive_rules.description: If a member of Thorin's Company slays an enemy Hero or Monster within 3" of Ori, that member may regain a lost point of either Might, Will or Fate.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Deadeye
active_or_passive_rules.description: If Ori scores a 6 when rolling To Hit, the target immediately suffers a single Wound and ignore any In The Way tests.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Orcrist
active_or_passive_rules.description: Elven-made hand-and-a-half sword with Orc bane, Goblin bane and Uruk-hai bane, Terror (Goblin), Terror (Orc) and Terror (Uruk-hai) special rules.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Oakenshield
active_or_passive_rules.description: If Thorin uses Shielding in a Fight and wins, he may make a single Strike at his Strength (but no bonuses from any weapons).

active_or_passive_rules.name: Defensive Bulwark
active_or_passive_rules.description: In the Way tests against the Chariot hit the rider on a 5+. In the Way tests must also be taken for Strikes against the Chariot.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Stable Platform
active_or_passive_rules.description: may still shoot after a full move.

active_or_passive_rules.name: The Chariot and Magic
active_or_passive_rules.description: See page 189 of Armies of LOTR.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Chariot Charge
active_or_passive_rules.description: See page 189 of Armies of LOTR.

additional_text: If a Horseman is dismounted, they drop either their bow or hand-and-a-half axe, chosen by the controlling player.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Commanding Presence
active_or_passive_rules.description: Friendly Khandish models within 6" of a Khandish King count as being in range of a banner.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Bill the Pony
active_or_passive_rules.description: May include Bill the Pony as part of Barliman's warband, even if your force doesn't include Sam, for a cost of 10 points. Barliman may benefit from Bill's Official Meals and Second Breakfast rules.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Barliman Butterbur, At Your Service
active_or_passive_rules.description: During his Move, if Barliman Butterbur is in base contact with a friendly Hero, he may spend a point of Will to roll a D6. On a 5+ (or a 4+ for Hero models from The Fellowship) the Hero regains a lost Wound.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Followers of the Bear
active_or_passive_rules.description: This model counts as being in range of a banner if they are within 6" of a friendly Bear model.

active_or_passive_rules.name: River-daughter
active_or_passive_rules.description: Automatically passes all Swim tests. Goldberry cannot be targeted by Abilities, Magical Powers or Shooting attacks. She automatically resists all Magical Powers, including those cast by friendly models. No models may move into his control zone, unless the controlling player allows it. Models that are Hurled, Barged or forced towards Goldberry will stop 1" away from her and suffer no further effects. She may Charge enemies, and will automatically win the Fight, however she nor any model in that Fight may make Strikes. Goldberry and all friendly models within 6" automatically pass Courage tests. She may not carry objectives.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Hey! Come Merry Doll!
active_or_passive_rules.description: Goldberry loses a point of Will at the end of any turn where she participated in a Fight. If she is reduced to 0 Will, or there are no other friendly models besides herself and Tom Bombadil, she wanders back off to her home and is removed as a casualty.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Skin-changer
active_or_passive_rules.description: To change Grimbeorn's form, you may roll a D6 at the start of his Move. On a 4+, Grimbeorn transforms into a man. Might may be used to influence this roll. Grimbeorn may then continue his move as normal, including making Charges. Grimbeorn cannot change form if an enemy model is in base contact with him.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Leader of the Beornings
active_or_passive_rules.description: Only Bear or Beorning models may benefit from Grimbeorn's Heroic Actions or Stand Fast!

active_or_passive_rules.name: Crushing Strength
active_or_passive_rules.description: If Beorn wins a Duel, instead of striking as normal, choose a single model in the fight to target a Strength 10 hit. If the To Wound roll is successful, the target suffers another Strength 10 hit, and so on, until the target is dead or Beorn fails to wound his victim.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Skin-changer
active_or_passive_rules.description: To change Grimbeorn's form, you may roll a D6 at the start of Beorn's Move. On a 4+, Grimbeorn transforms into a bear. Might may be used to influence this roll. Beorn may then continue his move as normal, including making Charges. Grimbeorn cannot change form if an enemy model is in base contact with him.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Leader of the Beornings
active_or_passive_rules.description: Only Bear or Beorning models may benefit from Grimbeorn's Heroic Actions or Stand Fast!

active_or_passive_rules.name: Lantern
active_or_passive_rules.description: The area within 12" of Harry is illuminated. Models within this area can be seen clearly, unless another special rule would prevent them from doing so.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Gatekeeper
active_or_passive_rules.description: After Priority has been rolled, Harry may spent a point of Will and choose one enemy Infantry model within 6" and in LoS of Harry, and roll a D6. On a 3+, that model cannot move that turn, but may perform any other action as normal.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Kalazal
active_or_passive_rules.description: A sword, receives +1 To Wound bonus when making strikes against Orc, Goblin or Uruk-hai models.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Shattered Spirit
active_or_passive_rules.description: At the start of every Priority phase before rolling, Thrain must take an unmodified Courage test (he can never be forced to automatically pass it). If passed, he acts normally. If it is passed on a double, Thrain adds +2 to his Fight, Strength, Attack and Courage value, until the end of the turn. If the test is failed, the opposing player controls Thrain. If Thrain is being used as a Good model, then Good models cannot target him with shooting, Magical Powers, or Strikes if they win fights against him.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Shattered Spirit
active_or_passive_rules.description: At the start of every Priority phase before rolling, Thrain must take an unmodified Courage test (he can never be forced to automatically pass it). If passed, he acts normally. If it is passed on a double, Thrain adds +2 to his Fight, Strength, Attack and Courage value, until the end of the turn. If the test is failed, the opposing player controls Thrain. If Thrain is being used as a Good model, then Good models cannot target him with shooting, Magical Powers, or Strikes if they win fights against him.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Tom is Master
active_or_passive_rules.description: Treat all difficult terrain as open, and always counts as having rolled a 6 on Jump, Leap, Climb or Swim tests. Tom cannot be targeted by Abilities, Magical Powers or Shooting attacks. He automatically resists all Magical Powers, including those cast by friendly models. No models may move into his control zone, unless the controlling player allows it. Models that are Hurled, Barged or forced towards Tom will stop 1" away from him and suffer no further effects. Tom may Charge enemies, and will automatically win the Fight, however Tom nor any model in that Fight may make Strikes. Tom and all friendly models within 3" automatically pass Courage tests. Tom may not carry objectives.

active_or_passive_rules.name: Hey! Come Merry Dol!
active_or_passive_rules.description: Tom loses a point of Will at the end of any turn where he participated in a Fight. If he is reduced to 0 Will, or there are no other friendly models besides himself and Goldberry, he wanders back off to his homestead and is removed as a casualty.
